issue.title: [R][Documentation] Document filename-based partitioning and filename-as-variable functionality
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16080](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16080). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Filename-based partitioning has been implemented in C++; we should add something to our docs about this.
